title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 605.5 - Use of college facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 605.5 - Use of college facilities

State Regulations

Subject to the approval of the college trustees, and in
accordance with college policy, the college may permit the use of college
facilities by internal or external groups for programs or meetings or other
functions in a nondiscriminatory manner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
605.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
